_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five things a mendicant cultivating: Few requirements and duties, unburdensome and contented with life’s necessities
Eat little, not devoted to filling their stomach
Very learned, remembering and keeping what they’ve learned
Review the extent of their mind’s freedom
